Reviews.Title: “Updated Property. Clean and Comfortabel”
Reviews.Author: loimln
Reviews.Content: This Fairfield Inn is very close to my client's office and is on the outskirts of Indy. Many restaurants and a supermarket located just across the street. This property has been updated with new amenities--a nice workout room and a pool that doesn't have windows looking right into it. Rooms are clean and comfortable. Front desk staff have always been very helpful and kind.

Reviews.Title: “Internet Worse then Dial-up”
Reviews.Author: Ali G
Reviews.Content: It's been a long time since I was not able to use Internet in a hotel, I was on a business trip and could not even check my email. The breakfast was not the buffet I was led to believe it was. Overall I will never stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Customer Service Horrible”
Reviews.Author: woofer824
Reviews.Content: I was planning on getting Surgery at Ortho Indy right next door and called and booked a reservation 3 weeks in advance. Showed up the day of the surgery and they told me they were overbooked and they could set me up at a sister property....20 min away. This hotel is 500 feet from the place I was going to have surgery instead I have to drive 20 min. Very unhappy with the lack of communication.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay!”
Reviews.Author: mbryant1
Reviews.Content: Second stay in 2 months and will stay there again! Great breakfast!! Bed was so comfortable! They upgraded us to a nicer King Suite!! Because we were gold reward members! That was a nice suprise. Great job!

Reviews.Title: “Good experience”
Reviews.Author: RetiredTravelerOhio
Reviews.Content: We were going to an impromptu reunion at my brother’s and I looked for a close place to stay. We have stayed at various other locations around Indianapolis and this one was just right. The location was closes to his house. The hotel looked well maintained and the staff was friendly. The rooms were clean and everything was in working order. The breakfast was a little above the usual Fairfield Inn. There was a NCAA swim meet that weekend and some of the teams were staying there also. The staff did not miss a beat on keeping breakfast well stocked. Overall the stay was excellent.

Reviews.Title: “Great Fairfield Inn”
Reviews.Author: NoelD37
Reviews.Content: We needed a place to stay on short notice as we were travelling and encountered a major storm. Marriot central reservations recommended this Fairfield Inn as the closest to our location and available. We were pleasently surprised ... we have stayed at many Fairfield Inns over the years, but this one is outstanding. Excellent staff - most helpful, great room - comfortable & quiet, very convenient. and a great rate. Highly recommend if you're in the area. Would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Inn”
Reviews.Author: JKS5
Reviews.Content: My husband and I love staying at this Fairfield Inn and Suites. The staff is very friendly and always try to please!

Reviews.Title: “Just Fine”
Reviews.Author: Empress5150
Reviews.Content: My husband and I recently stayed here, along with our good friends, during the Indy 500 weekend. We'd booked the rooms almost an entire year in advance. Typical of the majority of hotels in the area on race weekend, the rates almost double for Friday, Saturday and Sunday night. Can't really blame the hotel for this practice. Anyway, we had a fine stay. Our rooms were nice and the front desk worked hard to get us rooms close together. In general, the staff was friendly and helpful. We spent some time in the pool/jacuzzi; a bit of a chlorinated smell in there since it's totally enclosed and the jets on the jacuzzi went off after five minutes (a bit of a hassle to keep climbing in and out to turn them back on) BUT there were towels laid out on all of the chairs (a nice touch) and it was clean. The rooms were fine; we were next to the ice machine but for the most part, we hardly heard it. It was really quiet, too; great, considering what weekend it was. It seemed to us that the crowd there was definitely in the "want to have fun but aren't crazy about it" category. Average age seemed to be 50s. We ate breakfast three of the four mornings. Nice enough; a continental plus type affair. I did think it would have been nice of them to offer the breakfast outside the standard 7-10 on race day since the majority of the patrons left the hotel by 6:30 am to get to the track. They did, however, leave out cookies (and punch, I think, don't know, didn't try it) each evening in the lobby. So, if we're ever back for the race, we'd definitely stay here again. It was very convenient to the track as well as to numerous restaurants (chain and local) and a fantastic grocery store across the street.

Reviews.Title: “Typical Fairfield Inn. Front desk not as friendly as others”
Reviews.Author: WorldTraverler73
Reviews.Content: I'm currently here for a week on business. The location is great for being outside of the city. There are a ton of places close by to eat, shop, and entertain you. The beds seems newer and were very comfortable. The room was clean and stayed that way during my entire stay. Breakfast area awas great. Tons of room compared to some of the others I stayed it. Which is nice to not have to bring your breakfast to your room because all 10 tables are taken up. My only problem is with the front desk. Maybe I was spoiled but my recent stays at other fairfield inns have had exceptional front desk people. Always greeting you when you come in if they weren't with a guest and always wishing you a good night or day when you left. If you could find one that was sitting around the corner they didn't even acknowledge you. Just a small issue that really didn't affect my stay so I stick with the 4 star rating.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, New and Convenient”
Reviews.Author: rp17
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the hotel for one Saturday night for the Motogp races at the track. The hotel was perfect coming from Chicago, that it was North of the track away from all the traffic, but only a 10 minute drive to actually get there. The hotel seemed brand new, newly furnished with nice amenities including flat screeen tv in room. The location is right off the highway, near 15+ restaurants, grocery store and movie theatre. This is a the perfect place and location for a nice night stay for easy in and out of the Indianapolis area. Relatively great breakfast with fresh food and juice included, and staff was courteous. Will stay again next year.

HotelInfo.Name: Fairfield Inn Indianapolis Northwest
HotelInfo.Address: 5905 W 86th Street, Indianapolis, IN 46278
